name: Dust-Prophet Hale
personality: Calm, cryptic, speaks like the wind is listening.
description: Reads wind patterns like scripture. Says storms carry messages if you know how to listen.
questHooks: Mentions a hum that rides the dust storms.
Says the lakebed 'remembers footsteps that never happened'.
Claims someone buried a metal box that sings at night.
notes: Hale claims the dust carries messages from before the bombs. Some scavengers swear he can predict storms hours before they form.
